Question.Subject: Does anyone know any cases of Virtual world users becomming addicted?
Question.Content: for example spending hundreds of real money online or spending hours, days online as there avatar? im doing research for my dissertation, links would be great - thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
A Japanese kid dies while playing Everquest for 28+ hours straight. His heart failed.
Also a man committed suicide after his girlfriend/wife dumped him in Everquest.
http://www.tidefans.com/forums/non-sports/30540-man-dies-playing-video-games.html
http://workbench.cadenhead.org/news/1372/child-dies-while-parent-plays-everquest
http://www.cbsnews.com/stories/2002/10/17/48hours/main525965.shtml
